definition: handle or shaft (of an axe etc)/(of a flower, leaf or fruit) stem/sth that affords an advantage to an opponent/classifier for knives or blades

sentences.english: North american fern with a blackish lustrous stipe.
sentences.chinese: 带有光亮叶柄的一种北美蕨类。

sentences.english: The leaf stalk supports the leaf blade.
sentences.chinese: 叶柄的作用是支持叶片。

sentences.english: The results showed that leaf spot of P. canariensis mainly occurred on leaves and petioles.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，加那利海枣叶斑病主要发生在叶片和叶柄。

sentences.english: North American fern with narrow fronds on yellowish leafstalks.
sentences.chinese: 黄色叶柄处具有窄小复叶的北美蕨类。

sentences.english: North American fern with narrow fronds on yellowish leafstalks.
sentences.chinese: 带有光亮叶柄的一种北美蕨类。

sentences.english: Stems and petioles of basal leaves strigose.
sentences.chinese: 茎和基生叶的叶柄具糙伏毛。

sentences.english: Axillary buds are hidden beneath fleshy leaf petioles .
sentences.chinese: 腋芽隐藏下方肉质叶，叶柄。

sentences.english: Scales attaching to the base of petiole are brown, lanceolate.
sentences.chinese: 叶柄基部鳞片棕色，披针形。

sentences.english: Flowering stems and petioles spreading villous and pubescent.
sentences.chinese: 花茎和叶柄开展长柔毛和短柔毛。

sentences.english: Olive or petiole and cauline stalk are Brown.
sentences.chinese: 叶柄及茎秆黄绿色或褐色。

sentences.english: Leaf blade had more proportion than petiole in fresh weight.
sentences.chinese: 叶片占植株地上部鲜质量的比例高于叶柄。

sentences.english: Trim the stem ends by cutting with scissors.
Leaves basal, petiolate, usually minutely brown punctate .
sentences.chinese: 叶基生，具叶柄，通常细微棕色。

sentences.english: Phyllodes are analogous to leaf blades, but are derived from petioles (leaf stalks).
sentences.chinese: 叶状柄与叶片是同功器官，但它源于叶柄。

sentences.english: Trees or shrubs. Leaves petiolate , entire or serrate at margin.
sentences.chinese: 乔木或灌木叶具叶柄，全缘的或有锯齿在边缘。

definition: venation (pattern of veins on a leaf)
terminal bud (growing at the tip of a plant)
axillary bud/bud growing from axil of plant
